channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Digital Publications by Supsystic
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Digital Publications by Supsystic

item.title: CVE-2022-2384|2024-08-03T00:39:07.356Z -- unknown -- digital%20publications%20by%20supsystic
item.description: The Digital Publications by Supsystic WordPress plugin before 1.7.4 does not sanitise and escape its settings, allowing high privilege users such as admin to perform cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.
